about_the_game:
A band of bold pirates and their legendary captain are tantalizingly close to obtaining wealth beyond their wildest dreams! But the search for treasure is a daunting task. Captain Inigo Martinez and his pirate crew could use some help. Facing danger on the high seas, exploring remote and mysterious far reaches of the oceans — all of that and much more is in store for our seasoned seafarers on a journey to find a fabulous treasure! Remember: a pirate never backs down! Not from a storm, not from a horrifying monster, not from a bloody battle at sea!

Complete 200 different Solitaire games with a difficulty setting of your choice. Join the pirate crew and journey to discover the legendary treasure!

- Follow along with the story of pirates hunting for a fabulous treasure!

- Unique take on Solitaire with an intriguing plot!

- Engaging and straightforward gameplay!

- Build up the best combo you can to earn bonuses!

- In-game helpers and bonuses to help you progress!

- Search for the legendary treasure!

- 200 unique and fantastic games of Solitaire!

- Challenge yourself to overcome various obstacles!
